attributes.action: Schools should either be fined or make up lost days for school closures: snow, staff strikes, boiler breakdowns and teacher training days
attributes.additional_details: Schools should have to either pay a fine or make up days lost due to snow, staff strikes, teacher training and boiler breakdowns. They could use the summer holiday days until they have paid back the missed days. Education is important (hence families not allowed to take children out of term time) so any lost days should be made up. Other businesses have to provide staff staff training and keep the service open so teacher training should be made up also.
